statements: SELECT * FROM ArtEventOrganizers;
SELECT organizer_name, event_name FROM ArtEventOrganizers WHERE event_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT event_name, organizer_name FROM ArtEventOrganizers ORDER BY organizer_name ASC;
SELECT registration_link FROM ArtEventOrganizers WHERE organizer_name = 'Art Expo Organizers';
SELECT organizer_id, organizer_name, event_name, event_date FROM ArtEventOrganizers WHERE event_date < '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM ArtEventOrganizers WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY organizer_name DESC;
SELECT organizer_name, event_name FROM ArtEventOrganizers WHERE organizer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT organizer_name, COUNT(event_name) AS event_count FROM ArtEventOrganizers GROUP BY organizer_name HAVING event_count > 1 ORDER BY event_count DESC;
SELECT organizer_name, event_name, registration_link FROM ArtEventOrganizers WHERE event_name LIKE '%Exhibition%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ArtEventOrganizers WHERE event_date < '2022-06-30' AND (organizer_name LIKE 'A%' OR organizer_name LIKE 'B%') ORDER BY event_date ASC, organizer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM registrations
SELECT id, participant_name, registration_date FROM registrations WHERE event_id = 1
SELECT participant_name, registration_date FROM registrations ORDER BY registration_date DESC
SELECT event_id, venue_name, start_date, end_date FROM logistics
SELECT venue_name, start_date, end_date FROM logistics WHERE event_id = 2
SELECT * FROM registrations WHERE event_id = 1 ORDER BY participant_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT participant_name, registration_date FROM registrations WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND registration_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT participant_name FROM registrations WHERE participant_name LIKE '%John%' AND event_id = 3;
SELECT r.participant_name, l.venue_name, l.start_date FROM registrations r JOIN logistics l ON r.event_id = l.event_id WHERE l.start_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY l.start_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_registrations FROM registrations;
SELECT * FROM ArtEventOrganizers;
SELECT organizer_name, organizer_contact FROM ArtEventOrganizers WHERE organizer_id = 1;
SELECT event_id, attendee_name FROM Registration WHERE registration_id = 2;
SELECT logistic_id, logistic_type FROM Logistics ORDER BY logistic_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Logistics WHERE event_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM ArtEventOrganizers WHERE organizer_id = 1
SELECT organizer_name FROM ArtEventOrganizers ORDER BY organizer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Registration WHERE event_id = 1000 ORDER BY registration_date ASC
SELECT attendee_name, registration_date FROM Registration JOIN Logistics ON Registration.event_id = Logistics.event_id WHERE logistics_type = 'venue'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_registrations FROM Registration
SELECT * FROM organizers;
SELECT organizer_name, organizer_email FROM organizers;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, organizer_id FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT registration_id, attendee_name, registration_date FROM registrations WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date, organizer_name FROM events LEFT JOIN organizers ON events.organizer_id = organizers.organizer_id;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND event_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT organizer_name, COUNT(event_id) AS total_events FROM organizers LEFT JOIN events ON organizers.organizer_id = events.organizer_id GROUP BY organizer_name;
SELECT events.event_name, logistics.logistic_description FROM events INNER JOIN logistics ON events.event_id = logistics.event_id WHERE logistic_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT registration_id, attendee_name, registration_date, events.event_name FROM registrations INNER JOIN events ON registrations.event_id = events.event_id;
SELECT * FROM organizers;
SELECT organizer_name, organizer_email FROM organizers ORDER BY organizer_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email, registration_date FROM registrations WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, ticket_type, ticket_price FROM events JOIN tickets ON events.event_id = tickets.event_id WHERE tickets.ticket_price > 50.00 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, organizer_name FROM events INNER JOIN organizers ON events.organizer_id = organizers.organizer_id
SELECT event_name, ticket_type, ticket_price FROM events JOIN tickets ON events.event_id = tickets.event_id
SELECT organizer_name, organizer_email, COUNT(event_id) AS num_events FROM organizers LEFT JOIN events ON organizers.organizer_id = events.organizer_id GROUP BY organizer_name, organizer_email
SELECT DISTINCT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT attendee_name, registration_date, ticket_type, ticket_price FROM registrations JOIN tickets ON registrations.registration_id = tickets.registration_id
